    • Uses of Edge in model

      Methods in model that return Edge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Edge[] Board.getBorderingEdges(int aX, int aY)
      Get bordering edges of a field with the following order: {NorthEast, East, SouthEast, SouthWest, West, NorthWest}.
      Edge Board.getEdge(int x, int y, int dir)
      Deprecated. 
      Edge Board.getEdgeAt(int aX, int aY, int dir)
      Returns edge given axial coordinates and index(direction), if edge doesn't exist then null.
      Edge[] Board.getLinkedEdges(int aX, int aY, int dir)
      Get edges that are linked to the specified edge with the following order: For NorthWestern edge (i = 0): {North, SouthEast, South, NorthWest} For NorthEastern edge (i = 1): {North, NorthEast, South, SouthWest} for Eastern edge (i = 2): {NorthEast, SouthEast, SouthWest, NorthWest}.
      Edge[] Board.getProjectingEdges(int aX, int aY, int dir)
      Get edges that are projected to the specified corner with the following order: For Northern corner (i = 0): {North, SouthEast, SouthWest} For Southern corner (i = 1): {NorthEast, South, NorthWest}.

      After receiving how the board appears, translate it to how the board is created in the model, and initialize all field types, harbour locations, buildings.
